card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
card.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

appearance.flavor: "Learn not only from the failures of the past, but also from its triumphs."\n—Isperia

card.name: Ætherize
card.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

appearance.flavor: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

card.name: Banisher Priest
card.text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

appearance.flavor: "Oathbreaker, I cast you out!"

card.name: Captain of the Watch
card.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nOther Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.\nWhen Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Celestial Flare
card.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

appearance.flavor: "You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression."\n—Gideon Jura

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

appearance.flavor: "Nature was slowly heading in the right direction, but we know how to achieve faster results."\n—Vorel of the Hull Clade

card.name: Court Street Denizen
card.text: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

appearance.flavor: "The Boros fight for justice. The Azorius fight for law. I hold the line between, and make sure the people are given both."

card.name: Dauntless Onslaught
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

appearance.flavor: "The people of Akros must learn from our leonin adversaries. If we match their staunch ferocity with our superior faith, we cannot fail."\n—Cymede, queen of Akros

card.name: Decree of Justice
card.text: Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nCycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dictate of Heliod
card.text: Flash\nCreatures you control get +2/+2.

appearance.flavor: "In our war Heliod gave mortals some favor, yet other times he withheld aid. Are we still no more than game pieces to him?"\n—Polyxene the Doubter

card.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion
card.text: +1: Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.\n-3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.\n-7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

appearance.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

card.name: Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn.\nDraw a card.

appearance.flavor: "I will never run out of new oceans to explore or new sea-dwellers to embrace as my own."\n—Kiora

card.name: Explosive Vegetation
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

appearance.flavor: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

card.name: Gempalm Avenger
card.text: Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Grazing Gladehart
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

appearance.flavor: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."\n—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Gustcloak Harrier
card.text: Flying\nWhenever Gustcloak Harrier becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

appearance.flavor: Banking steeply, the aven streaked toward the ground—and vanished.

card.name: Gustcloak Savior
card.text: Flying\nWhenever a creature you control becomes blocked, you may untap that creature and remove it from combat.

appearance.flavor: "Our death-arrows flew in high arcs towards the aven. And then . . . nothing."\n—Coliseum guard

card.name: Gustcloak Sentinel
card.text: Whenever Gustcloak Sentinel becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

appearance.flavor: Entire platoons have mysteriously vanished from battle, leaving enemy weapons to slice through empty air.

card.name: Gustcloak Skirmisher
card.text: Flying\nWhenever Gustcloak Skirmisher becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

appearance.flavor: They're trained in the art of pressing their luck.

card.name: Icatian Javelineers
card.text: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it.\n{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Inkwell Leviathan
card.text: Islandwalk, trample\nShroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

appearance.flavor: "Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains."\n—Esper fable

card.name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
card.text: When Kinsbaile Skirmisher enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

appearance.flavor: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."

card.name: Kiora, the Crashing Wave
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.\n-1: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn.\n-5: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, put a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token onto the battlefield."

card.name: Kiora's Follower
card.text: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

appearance.flavor: "She may call herself Kiora but I believe she is Thassa, the embodiment of the sea and empress of the depths."

card.name: Kor Skyfisher
card.text: Flying\nWhen Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

appearance.flavor: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

appearance.flavor: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."\n—Ranalus, vedalken heretic

card.name: Loxodon Partisan
card.text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

appearance.flavor: "On every plane I've encountered loxodons, I've found stalwart and loyal friends."\n—Elspeth

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

appearance.flavor: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."\n—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Mighty Leap
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

appearance.flavor: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."\n—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

card.name: Mortal's Ardor
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

appearance.flavor: "Such deeds should be common fare for such as us."\n—Anax, king of Akros

card.name: Mother of Runes
card.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

appearance.flavor: She will not touch a weapon, yet she is the greatest protector her people have ever known.

card.name: Nessian Asp
card.text: Reach\n{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

appearance.flavor: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.

card.name: Netcaster Spider
card.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nWhenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

appearance.flavor: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

card.name: Nimbus Swimmer
card.text: Flying\nNimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

appearance.flavor: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

card.name: Noble Templar
card.text: Vigilance\nPlainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Omenspeaker
card.text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

appearance.flavor: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

card.name: Peel from Reality
card.text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

appearance.flavor: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

card.name: Plasm Capture
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

appearance.flavor: "Everything serves a purpose. Even you."\n—Vorel of the Hull Clade

card.name: Precinct Captain
card.text: First strike\nWhenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

appearance.flavor: "In troubled times, we all need someone to watch our back."

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.text: Put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

appearance.flavor: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

card.name: Scourge of Fleets
card.text: When Scourge of Fleets enters the battlefield, return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

card.name: Sealock Monster
card.text: Sealock Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.\n{5}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)\nWhen Sealock Monster becomes monstrous, target land becomes an Island in addition to its other types.

card.name: Secluded Steppe
card.text: Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.\nCycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
card.text: Flying, trample\nShroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

appearance.flavor: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."\n—Momir Vig

card.name: Soul Parry
card.text: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

appearance.flavor: "I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."\n—Elspeth
"Bant sentries were called the Angel Line. They never faltered, and they were ready to die defending their position."\n—Elspeth

card.name: Sunlance
card.text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

appearance.flavor: "It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."\n—Orim, Samite inquisitor

card.name: Surrakar Banisher
card.text: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

appearance.flavor: Surrakar grab things they don't want.

card.name: Temple of the False God
card.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

appearance.flavor: "When gods become apathetic, the people will worship anyone who answers their pleas."\n—Kiora

card.name: Time to Feed
card.text: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

appearance.flavor: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

card.name: Veteran Armorsmith
card.text: Other Soldier creatures you control get +0/+1.

appearance.flavor: "Courage is a proud and gleaming shield. It does not bend or hide from sight. To fight with courage, we must forge in steel."

card.name: Veteran Swordsmith
card.text: Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+0.

appearance.flavor: "Truth is a straight, keen edge. There are no soft angles or rounded edges. To fight for truth, we must forge in steel."

card.name: Whelming Wave
card.text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

appearance.flavor: "I can see why this appeals to Thassa."\n—Kiora
